page.title: 14Kingsway Technical College
page.content: A schools' micro-computer fair was held at{Kingsway Technical College}on the 18th and 19th of June 1985.It was all about computers and what you can do with them.There were exhibits from Primary schools and from Secondary schools as well as from students at college. Programs on display were presented by pupils from some of the schools involved and covered all sorts of educational applications including programs for the handicapped. {Kingsway Technical College}provides a range of courses for full-time, part-time and day-release students. These include gardening, electronics, catering,plumbing, hairdressing and beauty therapy. The most popular courses are hairdressing and catering.
